body:
### My work on GitHub and elsewhere

+ ####[rest-auth-proxy](https://github.com/kamranzafar/rest-auth-proxy)
Java based restful ldap-authentication proxy server

+ ####[libotp](https://github.com/kamranzafar/libotp)
A simple Java OTP (One Time Password) generator library, currently supports RFC standard time based and counter based algorithms.

+ ####[jcl](https://github.com/kamranzafar/JCL)
Jar Class Loader, a configurable and dynamic custom classloader designed to create, manage and manipulate isolated Java classloaders in IoC frameworks and web applications.

+ ####[jtar](https://github.com/kamranzafar/jtar)
JTar is a simple Java Tar library, that provides an easy way to create and read tar files using IO streams. The API is very simple to use and similar to the java.util.zip package

+ ####[jddl](https://github.com/kamranzafar/jddl)
Java http direct download library

+ ####[treeing](https://github.com/kamranzafar/treeing)
Crawl, index and search web content. Demonstrates indexing with Apache Lucene
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Kamran
